text: Jóhannes Haukur Jóhannesson (born February 26th, 1980) is an Icelandic actor known for his roles on the series Game of Thrones and The Innocents and in the films Atomic Blonde and Alpha.https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1778512/bio ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Title ! scope="col" | Role ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Notes |- | 2008 | Reykjavík-Rotterdam | Eiríkur | |- | 2009 | Bjarnfreðarson | Guffi | |- | 2012 | Black's Game | Tóti | |- | 2014 | Noah | Cain | Uncredited |- | rowspan=2|2017 | Atomic Blonde | Yuri Bakhtin | |- | I Remember You | Freyr | |- | rowspan=2|2018 | Alpha | Tau | |- | The Sisters Brothers | Head Trapper | |- | rowspan=2|2019 | Where'd You Go, Bernadette | Captain J.
